job_title: Junior Web and Mobile UI Designer (Co-op)
job_description: Mobify is looking for a Junior Web & Mobile UI Designer Co-op to join us for the Spring co-op term for 4 or 8 months. You will be part of our R&D product team responsible for designing and building core components of our next-generation web platform serving billions of page views for some of the most recognized brands in the world. You'll work with our team on the creative execution of new features for our web-based products. You'll have mentorship from best-in-class designers through each step of the design process from wireframe to integration to user testing.Mobify designers need to know how far they can push the limits of web technologies. To this end it is essential that you have working knowledge of HTML and CSS to hand-code your designs into functioning templates. A familiarity with Javascript for user interaction purposes is preferred.ResponsibilitiesMake our products shine with world class visual design, user interaction, and animationYou'll create the experience, design the pixels, work with our engineering team to execute, and iterate frequentlyCollaborate with cross discipline teams to prototype, design and implement web-based experiencesResearch mobile design patterns that work, test with usersContribute to weekly design meetings and be receptive to feedback from other designers
job_requirements: YouHave a strong online portfolio showcasing user interface and experience design, along with code examplesAre familiar with all the latest responsive web design techniquesAre able to quickly and efficiently hand-code your designs into HTML and CSS without the assistance of CSS frameworks like Bootstrap or FoundationHave a passion for the UI/UX design, web and mobileAre thoughtful in your design process and can communicate solutions to an engineering teamTake ownership over your work from start to finishBonus PointsExperience implementing software and coding in JavascriptInterest in working in a start-up environmentAbout usMobify (www.mobify.com) is the mobile commerce platform of choice for leading Fortune 500 companies and drives hundreds of millions of dollars of revenue across web, apps and in-store every year.Our technology empowers marketers and developers at companies like Crocs, Starbucks, ideeli, Leading Hotels of the World, British Telecom and Beyond the Rack to deliver phenomenal mobile experiences that surprise and delight their customers.Open To All Majors:No
